Point Red is a service brand under IIJ America-ISP (a subsidiary of Internet Initiative Japan: NASDAQ:IIJI) that is designated to provide reliable hosting services. By connecting high-end servers to the IIJ Group’s own Internet backbone network which is monitored by experienced network engineers, Point Red provides reliable hosting services that range from shared, VPS, Hybrid and dedicated servers.
